Results for

ARHitTestListener

public interface ARHitTestListener

com.viro.core.ARHitTestListener

Callback interface for responding to AR hit-test results. These hit-tests are initiated through the ViroViewARCore. Hit-tests are used to search the ARScene for real-world objects.

Summary

Public methods

abstract void onHitTestFinished(ARHitTestResult[] results)

Invoked when an AR hit-test has completed.

Public methods

onHitTestFinished

void onHitTestFinished (ARHitTestResult[] results)

Invoked when an AR hit-test has completed. As each hit-test can intersect with multiple real-world objects, an array of results is returned.

Parameters
results ARHitTestResult: The results of the hit-test, each in an ARHitTestResult.
